string-array.name: motivation_quote
string-array.item: The Only Way to Do Great Work is to Love What You Do.
The expert in anything was once a beginner.
Everything will be ok in the end. If it’s not ok, it’s not the end.
To Improve is To Change, To be Perfect is To Change Often.
To be a champ, you have to believe in yourself when nobody else will.
Alone we go faster, together we go further.

resources.string: This Shell Application is made during my training course as a showcase. This session occurred in april 2017 during 20 days with 14 lovely learners.
